# 🐞 Bug Report

## 📝 Description  
Describe the bug or unexpected behavior.

## 🔁 Reproduction Steps  
List the steps to reproduce the bug.

## ✅ Acceptance Criteria  
List the conditions that must be met for this bug to be considered resolved.
